products.title: Rimini, Azure - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, azure - roller blind the pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it! It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able t
products.productdescription: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it! It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Rimini, Turquoise - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, turquoise - roller blind the bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still pene
products.productdescription: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

products.title: Rimini, Powder Blue - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, powder blue - roller blind rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your
products.productdescription: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), blue - roller blind the rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to
products.productdescription: The rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to any room. Use the rimini blue to match pretty florals in the bedroom for a fresh, country look, or stark whites in the kitchen for a contemporary style. It's also the perfect shade for a sea-themed bathroom or a fun, colourful playroom for the kids.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), bluebell - roller blind the rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout mate
products.productdescription: The rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout material that provides all you need when it comes to keeping out the glare of the sun. Combine the pretty bluebell colour with soft yellows and rich creams to create a vibrant yet not overpowering colour scheme. This is the perfect shade for a fresh, country chic bedroom or for the kitchen, paired with dainty florals and subtle stripes.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cobalt - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), cobalt - roller blind mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure
products.productdescription: Mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure to add a burst of alluring colour and personality wherever it goes.Display the cobalt against a contrasting white and dove grey background for a contemporary palette in a teenager's bedroom. Match the blind with ocean blue fabrics and steel grey soft furnishings for a current look with a continued theme of stormy blue shades.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), navy - roller blind the rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your
products.productdescription: The rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your room or affecting your night's sleep. Offset the navy against a bright reds and ice whites for a fun, naval theme in a living room or bedroom. Or consider combining it with a lighter blues and purples for a beautifully stepped colour theme in a dining room or home office.
